data.title: 2024 Headwear - Flip eBook Pages 1-50
data.meta_description: View flipping ebook version of 2024 Headwear published by Ahead USA on 2023-06-22. Interested in flipbooks about 2024 Headwear? Check more flip ebooks related to 2024 Headwear of Ahead USA. Share 2024 Headwear everywhere for free.
data.text:
2024 Headwear by Ahead, LLC

A History of Innovation For over 28 years Ahead headwear has been synonymous with great styling and fabrication, amazing fits, and creative ornamentation. Our 2024 headwear collection is no exception. With more newness than ever and an expanded commitment to our market leading aerosphere and lightweight cotton fabrications, Ahead once again delivers a world class assortment that is perfect for any shop, resort, or outing. Ahead’s experienced team of talented graphic artists can help bring your logo to life - either by interpreting it in different decoration techniques or suggesting secondary graphics to complement your core logo sales – or both! We back all of this up with the thoughtful customer service, quick turnaround, and beautiful, creative decoration that you’ve come to know from Ahead. Contact your ahead advisor: Ahead USA - World Headquarters 270 Samuel Barnet Blvd. New Bedford, MA 02745 1-800-282-2246 FRONT COVER: MEN’S M36RPR ZURICH 07BG-CEMENT HAT DESIGN: PVC L70RTS GROOVE 135S-CREAM/SWIRL HAT DESIGN: CLF

P: 800 282 2246 F: 508 742 4141 AHEADWEB.COM 3 Contents TABLE OF AeroSphere Lightweight Cotton Cotton Twill Modern Trend Floral Prints Fashion Prints Sustainable Material Fitted Performance Sport Laser Panels Textured Sport Heathered Sport Ballmarker Cap X-Large Caps Casual Distressed Pigment Dyed Sun Hats Bucket Hats Straw Hats Visors 0 6 1 0 1 2 1 3 1 6 1 7 2 0 2 2 2 4 2 6 2 6 2 9 3 1 3 1 3 2 3 4 3 6 3 8 3 9 4 0 4 2 4 6 4 8 4 9 5 0 5 2 5 4 5 6 5 8 6 0 6 2 6 3 Knits Womens Headwear Womens Ponytail Womens Cottons Womens Fashion Womens Performance Womens Sun & Buckets Womens Visors Womens Knits Youth Headwear Private Label Index

Style & Shelf Appeal 4 For over 28 years, Ahead has provided our retail partners with new and innovative ways to get their apparel and headwear noticed. Put our domestic ornamentation capabilities and unmatched knack for “shelf appeal” to work for you... and get ready to restock! Left to right: Bounce Stitch Frayed Twill Applique Triples Pro Applique Textured Embroidery Reprint PV Patch Woven Patch Direct Embroidery Cambridge Quad Vintage Label on Felt Applique Sonicweld Rust Venice Greenwich ResX Chatham Chain Stitch Gelz Trailblazer
